topic.title: Dark theme Shouldn't have white buttons.
This site doesn't show ZeroMe avatars.
topic.body: I assumed it would considering that it's an Alpha version.

1549378596_175EyKtgTGXztQ4aoLiG3ghPmVqzq.body:
The videos aren't loading but I have ZU and ZUU downloaded since forever ago.

Edit: It now works.
How do I share a video? Just make a URL?
Make sure you disallow clearnet links. I'll test that.

> [geekless](#comment_19_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): Fixed.

Now for IPFS.

![](http://127.0.0.1:8080/ipfs/QmcniBv7UQ4gGPQQW2BwbD4ZZHzN3o3tPuNLZCbBchd1zh)

It registers as clearnet, but it's not.
You also should allow the title in [] to show for Zeronet links.

Non-added site (Deleted ZeroUp to test on my end)

![](/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp/Star%20Trek%20Discovery%20%20Official%20Trailer%20[HD]%20%20Netflix%20[HD,%201280x720].mp4)

Might there be a way to dynamically add sites but also showing the Bitcoin address?

> [geekless](#comment_21_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): Not sure if we should allow embedding for any non-zeronet media at all. They can be used for tracking the users. IPFS works on the plain IP addresses, it is almost the same dangerous as clearnet.

Understood

> [ngc](#comment_3_1Ee72Vmn581qKBm6umMgNBT4DEN4z6r1L): 

I saw the glowing version of this that you made. I've wondered if you wouldn't mind remaking my avatar. Show half of it. If I like it, I'll give you something for the whole image. You tell me how you'll accept reward.

> [ngc](#comment_4_1Ee72Vmn581qKBm6umMgNBT4DEN4z6r1L): You can use it as you please)) I myself did this picture)) Everyone can use it as they please))

Appreciated. Can you do a glowing green PNG version? Less padding too?

> [ngc](#comment_8_1Ee72Vmn581qKBm6umMgNBT4DEN4z6r1L): Write me on Zero mail

I don't need it. It was a suggestion. I know it's not much work to make those changes.

> [geekless](#comment_22_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): It should generate CORS requests automatically in the same way as ZeroBlog++ does, but I haven't ported the code yet.

Please do. I see you hadn't yet.

You should allow WebM to be embedded.

Only Apple doesn't support it, but WebM has more OS and browser support without fail.

1549373688_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body: Disable being able to upvote your own posts/comments.

> [geekless](#comment_23_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): Yeah, it's on my TODO list. Thanks for the reminder. [...]

I like that idea. Trolls are the most likely to self-upvote.

1585821873_1CpcxT1xWtqTRZTRR1KnH8gGsY2i4.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_2_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): What is "delete any post button"? You can already delete others' posts if you're an admin of the ZeroTalk. To do this, you hover someone's post or comment, click the pencil at the left and then press "Delete" at the bottom.

That easy? Huh...

Maybe I'll make a clone.

1598713020_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
> [thorburn](#comment_1_1Q2noE3qu7ccvEspqWWv4xkMktiqp6mhdK): I'm afraid that the dark theme has a white menu and search button for me.

That's what I mean.

1598791985_19dzDaMFcuCusp4anMUPkVc8zRzLJ.body: We're in a bad timeline for that to happen.

1617983013_1HV7aMJLo3XMuij1h17kP12ZYvp1Y.body: It's because of ISP connection interruption or maybe you simply have to restart ZeroNet. Nothing runs stable forever in the consumer PC space until DDR5 is involved.

> [rolouzis](#comment_1_16sZ53MFsJNXQGth1LUAPgbsR9K2ZtYNW2): search for more trackersand add this to your conf file: [...]

You have to download [Syncronite](/15CEFKBRHFfAP9rmL6hhLmHoXrrgmw4B5o/) first.
